content: Submit your template to the public gallery to let others use it in their work. Once the template passes moderation, you will be notified and rewarded for your contribution.

comment.text: This key provides the main informational text within a dialog box prompting users to submit their template to a public gallery. The text explains that successful submissions will be moderated, and contributors will be notified and rewarded. It appears in the body of the "Submit to Template Gallery" dialog.
